{{Infobox football tournament season | title = Copa del Rey | year = 1926 | other_title = | image = | imagesize = | caption = | country = Spain | num_teams = 24 | defending champions = | champions = [[FC Barcelona]] | runner-up = [[AtlÃ©tico de Madrid|Athletic Madrid]] | matches = 62 | goals = 300 | top goal scorer = | player = | prevseason = [[1925 Copa del Rey|1925]] | nextseason = [[1927 Copa del Rey|1927]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1926''' (known at that time as '''King [[Alfonso XIII]]'s Cup''') was the 24th edition of the [[Copa del Rey]]. The competition started on February 28, 1926 and concluded on May 16, 1926 with the final, held at the [[Estadio Mestalla|Mestalla]] in [[Valencia, Spain|Valencia]], in which [[FC Barcelona]] lifted the trophy for the 7th time ever with a 3â2 victory over [[Atletico Madrid|Athletic Madrid]]. ==Teams== For the first time ever, runners-up of each regional championship were able to participate in the tournament. So the tournament was expanded to 24 teams. *'''[[Aragon]]''': [[Real Zaragoza|Iberia SC]], [[Real Zaragoza|Zaragoza CD]] *'''[[Asturias]]''': [[Sporting de GijÃ³n]], [[Club Fortuna]] *'''[[Cantabria]]''': [[Racing de Santander]], [[GimnÃ¡stica de Torrelavega]] *'''[[Castile and LeÃ³n]]''': [[Cultural y Deportiva Leonesa]], [[Real UniÃ³n Deportiva]] *'''[[Catalonia]]''': [[FC Barcelona]], [[RCD EspaÃ±ol]] *'''[[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]]''': [[Celta de Vigo]], [[Deportivo de La CoruÃ±a]] *'''[[Gipuzkoa]]''': [[Real UniÃ³n]], [[Real Sociedad]] *'''[[Region of Murcia|Murcia]]''': [[Real Murcia]], [[Cartagena FC]] * '''Center Region''': [[Real Madrid]], [[AtlÃ©tico Madrid|Athletic Madrid]] * '''South Region''': [[Sevilla FC]], [[Real Betis]] *'''[[Valencian Community|Valencia]]''': [[Valencia FC|Valencia CF]], [[Levante FC]] * '''[[Biscay]]''': [[Athletic Bilbao]], [[Arenas Club de Getxo|Arenas Club]] ==Group stage== ===Group 1=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=165 |Team !wiBAN=20 |{{Tooltip|Pld |Played}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|W |Won}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|D |Drawn}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|L |Lost}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|GF |Goals for}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|GA |Goals against}} !width=20 |{{Tooltip|Pts |Points}} |- bgcolor="#CCFFCC" |align=left|'''[[RCD Espanyol]]''' |4||4||0||0||15||3||'''8''' |- |align=left|[[Valencia CF]] |4||1||0||3||12||9||'''2''' |- |align=left|[[Real Zaragoza|Iberia SC]] |4||1||0||3||5||20||'''2''' |} {| width=100% cellspacing=1 !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| !
